hints.content:
The first set of blocks shows $\purpleD3$ tens and $\purpleD5$ ones so, our first addend is $\purpleD{35}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/4bea22ba5203ee148c4d660b7c141ccb24d90291)

Our second set of blocks shows $\maroonD5$ tens and $\maroonD4$ ones so, our second addend is $\maroonD{54}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/bb7a776eb2b8a983a5fd8931504fa05ec1dc600b)

Our sum shows $8$ tens and $9$ ones, or $89$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/1d44860931fda2f808e52049b0be75967b8e7051)

This equation represents the place value blocks:

$\purpleD{35} + \maroonD{54} =89$

question.content:
**Which equation can be represented from the place value blocks below?**

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/2dbc5d56601df7da5cf2e18c18f677327269489a)

[[☃ radio 1]]
